virtual Texture2D* glr::glw::TextureManager::addTexture2D ( const std::string &  name,
const TextureSettings  settings = TextureSettings() 
)
virtual

Creates an empty texture with the given name and using the provided texture settings.

If a texture already exists with the given name, it will return that texture.

Parameters
name
settings
Returns
The empty Texture2D object.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2D* glr::glw::TextureManager::addTexture2D ( const std::string &  name,
const std::string &  filename,
const TextureSettings  settings = TextureSettings() 
)
virtual

Creates a texture with the given name and using the provided texture settings. It will fill the texture with the data loaded from the file 'filename'. The file must be a valid image.

If a texture already exists with the given name, it will return that texture.

Parameters
name
filename
settings
Returns
A Texture2D object.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2D* glr::glw::TextureManager::addTexture2D ( const std::string &  name,
utilities::Image *  image,
const TextureSettings  settings = TextureSettings() 
)
virtual

Creates a texture with the given name and using the provided texture settings. It will fill the texture with the data from the provided image. The image must be valid and non-null.

If a texture already exists with the given name, it will return that texture.

Parameters
name
image
settings
Returns
A Texture2D object.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2DArray* glr::glw::TextureManager::addTexture2DArray ( const std::string &  name,
const TextureSettings  settings = TextureSettings() 
)
virtual

Creates an empty texture 2d array with the given name and using the provided texture settings.

If a texture array already exists with the given name, it will return that texture array.

Parameters
name
settings
Returns
The empty Texture2DArray object.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2DArray* glr::glw::TextureManager::addTexture2DArray ( const std::string &  name,
const std::vector< std::string > &  filenames,
const TextureSettings  settings = TextureSettings() 
)
virtual

Creates a texture 2d array with the given name and using the provided texture settings. It will fill the texture array with the data loaded from the files specified in 'filenames'. The files must be valid images.

If a texture array already exists with the given name, it will return that texture.

Parameters
name
filenames
settings
Returns
A Texture2DArray object.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2DArray* glr::glw::TextureManager::addTexture2DArray ( const std::string &  name,
const std::vector< utilities::Image * > &  images,
const TextureSettings  settings = TextureSettings() 
)
virtual

Creates a texture 2d array with the given name and using the provided texture settings. It will fill the texture array with the data from the provided images. The images must be valid and non-null.

If a texture array already exists with the given name, it will return that texture.

Parameters
name
images
settings
Returns
A Texture2DArray object.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2D* glr::glw::TextureManager::getTexture2D ( const std::string &  name) const
virtual

Returns the texture with the given name. If a texture with the given name doesn't exist, it returns nullptr.

Parameters
name
Returns
The Texture2D object with name 'name', or nullptr if no texture exists with that name.

Implements glr::glw::ITextureManager.

virtual Texture2DArray* glr::glw::TextureManager::getTexture2DArray ( const std::string &  name) const
virtual

Returns the texture array with the given name. If a texture array with the given name doesn't exist, it returns nullptr.

Parameters
name
Returns
The Texture2DArray object with name 'name', or nullptr if no texture array exists with that name.
